UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Balteatide: a novel antimicrobial decapeptide from the skin secretion of the purple-sided leaf frog, Phyllomedusa baltea.
Literature.Author: Ge L, Chen X, Ma C, Zhou M, Xi X, Wang L, Ding A, Duan J, Chen T, Shaw C

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:0% Hemolysis=128 µg/ml,Human erythrocytes:8% Hemolysis=512 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli NCTC 10418(MIC=>512µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 10788(MIC=512µg/ml),Candida albicans NCPF 1467(MIC=512µg/ml)
